Card.cardDescription: Once per during your main phase, you may play this card to ATTACK any target hero within your attack/physical range; that hero may play a DODGE, if he does not play a DODGE, you deal 1 damage to that target hero.
Whenever a hero plays an ATTACK on you, you may play this card to cancel the ATTACK.

If this card is played during your main phase, gain 1 health. (You cannot gain health exceeding your maximum health) If any hero is on the brink of death, you may play this card to have that hero gain 1 health.
The next ATTACK you play deals 1 additional damage. If you are on the brink of death, you may play this card and gain 1 health.

Once per during your main phase, you may play this card to ATTACK any target hero within your attack/physical range; that hero may play a DODGE, if he does not play a DODGE, you deal 1 Fire damage to that target hero.

nce per during your main phase, you may play this card to ATTACK any target hero within your attack/physical range; that hero may play a DODGE, if he does not play a DODGE, you deal 1 Lightning damage to that target hero.
